data.eml:eml: A Revised Checklist of the UK Silverfish (Zygentoma: Lepismatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chick, Andrew I. R. (2018): A Revised Checklist of the UK Silverfish (Zygentoma: Lepismatidae). Zootaxa 4504 (3): 447-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4504.3.10
